info.name: AI RFQ Engine GraphQL API
info.description: Complete collection of GraphQL queries and mutations for the AI RFQ Engine. This collection includes all CRUD operations for managing items, segments, providers, quotes, requests, and related entities.

request.description: Simple ping query to test API connectivity

graphql.query:
query GetItem($itemUuid: String!) {
  item(itemUuid: $itemUuid) {
    endpointId
    itemUuid
    itemType
    itemName
    itemDescription
    uom
    itemExternalId
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

request.description: Get a specific item by UUID
Get a specific segment by UUID
Create or update a segment contact
List segment contacts with optional filters
Create or update a provider item
Get a specific provider item by UUID
List provider items with optional filters
Delete a provider item by UUID
Create or update a provider item batch

graphql.query:
query GetProviderItemBatch($providerItemUuid: String!, $batchNo: String!) {
  providerItemBatch(providerItemUuid: $providerItemUuid, batchNo: $batchNo) {
    providerItem
    batchNo
    item
    expiredAt
    producedAt
    costPerUom
    freightCostPerUom
    additionalCostPerUom
    totalCostPerUom
    guardrailMarginPerUom
    guardrailPricePerUom
    pricePerUom
    slowMoveItem
    inStock
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

request.description: Get a specific provider item batch

graphql.query:
query ListProviderItemBatches($itemUuid: String, $providerItemUuid: String, $inStock: Boolean, $expiredAtGt: DateTime, $limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  providerItemBatchList(
    itemUuid: $itemUuid
    providerItemUuid: $providerItemUuid
    inStock: $inStock
    expiredAtGt: $expiredAtGt
    limit: $limit
    pageNumber: $pageNumber
  ) {
    providerItemBatchList {
      providerItem
      batchNo
      item
      expiredAt
      producedAt
      costPerUom
      freightCostPerUom
      additionalCostPerUom
      totalCostPerUom
      guardrailMarginPerUom
      guardrailPricePerUom
      pricePerUom
      slowMoveItem
      inStock
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}

request.description: List provider item batches with optional filters
Create or update an item price tier

graphql.query:
query GetItemPriceTier($itemUuid: String!, $itemPriceTierUuid: String!) {
  itemPriceTier(itemUuid: $itemUuid, itemPriceTierUuid: $itemPriceTierUuid) {
    providerItem
    itemPriceTierUuid
    segment
    quantityGreaterThen
    quantityLessThen
    marginPerUom
    pricePerUom
    providerItemBatches
    status
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

request.description: Get a specific item price tier

graphql.query:
query ListItemPriceTiers($itemUuid: String, $limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  itemPriceTierList(itemUuid: $itemUuid, limit: $limit, pageNumber: $pageNumber) {
    itemPriceTierList {
      providerItem
      itemPriceTierUuid
      segment
      quantityGreaterThen
      quantityLessThen
      marginPerUom
      pricePerUom
      providerItemBatches
      status
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}

request.description: List item price tiers with optional filters
Create or update a discount rule

graphql.query:
query GetDiscountRule($itemUuid: String!, $discountRuleUuid: String!) {
  discountRule(itemUuid: $itemUuid, discountRuleUuid: $discountRuleUuid) {
    providerItem
    discountRuleUuid
    segment
    subtotalGreaterThan
    subtotalLessThan
    maxDiscountPercentage
    status
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

request.description: List discount rules with optional filters

{

  "shippingAddress": {"street": "456 Shipping Ave", "city": "City", "state": "State", "zip": "67890"},

graphql.query:
query GetRequest($requestUuid: String!) {
  request(requestUuid: $requestUuid) {
    endpointId
    requestUuid
    email
    requestTitle
    requestDescription
    billingAddress
    shippingAddress
    items
    notes
    status
    expiredAt
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

request.description: Get a specific request by UUID

graphql.query:
query ListRequests($limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  requestList(limit: $limit, pageNumber: $pageNumber) {
    requestList {
      endpointId
      requestUuid
      email
      requestTitle
      requestDescription
      billingAddress
      shippingAddress
      items
      notes
      status
      expiredAt
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}

query GetQuote($requestUuid: String!, $quoteUuid: String!) {
  quote(requestUuid: $requestUuid, quoteUuid: $quoteUuid) {
    request
    quoteUuid
    providerCorpExternalId
    salesRepEmail
    shippingMethod
    shippingAmount
    totalQuoteAmount
    totalQuoteDiscount
    finalTotalQuoteAmount
    quoteItems
    rounds
    notes
    status
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

query ListQuotes($requestUuid: String, $limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  quoteList(requestUuid: $requestUuid, limit: $limit, pageNumber: $pageNumber) {
    quoteList {
      request
      quoteUuid
      providerCorpExternalId
      salesRepEmail
      shippingMethod
      shippingAmount
      totalQuoteAmount
      totalQuoteDiscount
      finalTotalQuoteAmount
      quoteItems
      rounds
      notes
      status
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}

request.description: Create or update a quote item

graphql.query:
query GetQuoteItem($quoteUuid: String!, $quoteItemUuid: String!) {
  quoteItem(quoteUuid: $quoteUuid, quoteItemUuid: $quoteItemUuid) {
    quoteUuid
    quoteItemUuid
    providerItemUuid
    itemUuid
    batchNo
    requestUuid
    endpointId
    requestData
    slowMoveItem
    guardrailPricePerUom
    pricePerUom
    qty
    subtotal
    subtotalDiscount
    finalSubtotal
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

query ListQuoteItems($quoteUuid: String, $limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  quoteItemList(quoteUuid: $quoteUuid, limit: $limit, pageNumber: $pageNumber) {
    quoteItemList {
      quoteUuid
      quoteItemUuid
      providerItemUuid
      itemUuid
      batchNo
      requestUuid
      endpointId
      requestData
      slowMoveItem
      guardrailPricePerUom
      pricePerUom
      qty
      subtotal
      subtotalDiscount
      finalSubtotal
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}

request.description: List quote items with optional filters

graphql.query:
query GetInstallment($quoteUuid: String!, $installmentUuid: String!) {
  installment(quoteUuid: $quoteUuid, installmentUuid: $installmentUuid) {
    quote
    installmentUuid
    endpointId
    priority
    salesorderNo
    paymentMethod
    scheduledDate
    installmentRatio
    installmentAmount
    status
    createdAt
    updatedAt
    updatedBy
  }
}

query ListInstallments($quoteUuid: String, $limit: Int, $pageNumber: Int) {
  installmentList(quoteUuid: $quoteUuid, limit: $limit, pageNumber: $pageNumber) {
    installmentList {
      quote
      installmentUuid
      endpointId
      priority
      salesorderNo
      paymentMethod
      scheduledDate
      installmentRatio
      installmentAmount
      status
      createdAt
      updatedAt
      updatedBy
    }
    pageSize
    pageNumber
    total
  }
}
